description: Get the details of the transaction given by the identified block and index in that block. If no transaction is found, null is returned.

#/components/errors/INVALID_TXN_INDEX.message: Invalid transaction index in a block

name: starknet_getTransactionByBlockIdAndIndex

params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag
params.name: block_id

#/components/schemas/FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
#/components/schemas/FELT.title: Field element

#/components/schemas/BLOCK_TAG.description: A tag specifying a dynamic reference to a block
#/components/schemas/BLOCK_TAG.title: Block tag

params.name: index
params.summary: The index in the block to search for the transaction

#/components/schemas/TXN.description: The transaction schema, as it appears inside a block

#/components/schemas/INVOKE_TXN.description: Initiate a transaction from an account
